spells.name: Fire Shield
spells.description: Gain 10 defence until the start of your next turn. Until the start of your next turn, deal 2 damage disregarding defence to anyone that damages you.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: Deal 8 damage disregarding defence to a target.

spells.name: Freeze
spells.description: Freeze a target until your next turn.

spells.name: Instantaneous Implosion
spells.description: Deal 10 damage disregarding defence to a target. Can't miss if the target is tangible. Can't be countered.

spells.name: Missile Spell
spells.description: Create 3 missiles that deal 1 damage each disregarding defence.

spells.name: Pyroblast
spells.description: Deal 18 damage disregarding defence to a target.

spells.name: Rebuke of Fire
spells.description: Surround a target in a ring of fire with inner radius 2 meters and outer radius 1 meter. Whenever the target moves onto the ring within the next 3 turns, it takes 7 damage disregarding defence.

spells.name: Summon Meteor
spells.description: Summon a meteor at target place that deals 30 damage to anyone standing there. It arrives in 10 seconds. You must have direct access to the sky to cast this.

spells.name: Summon Phoenix
spells.description: Summon a phoenix that lasts 5 turns. Each turn, it deals 2 damage to each of up to 2 enemies disregarding defence.

primaryWeapon.name: Elemental Sword
primaryWeapon.description: A shiny sword hilt that, when activated, forms a blade of the wielder's element.

armour.name: Fire-hardened Armour
armour.description: A fire-hardened chestplate forged by a legendary blacksmith.

helmet.name: Etherium Helmet
helmet.description: A light helmet made of etherium that grants water breathing for up to two hours.

footwear.name: Mithril Boots
footwear.description: A pair of mithril boots enchanted by Merlin the mage to give the wielder extreme speed.

accessories.name: Gurnish Bracer
accessories.description: A sturdy bracer from a Gurnish stone.

accessories.name: Ring of Replenishing Energy
accessories.description: A golden ring that grants the wearer 1 energy every turn if the wearer attacked or cast a spell.
